messages.content: Dear neighbour, As someone who has grown up in Scarborough & Whitby, has been educated at local schools and who now runs a business here, I feel a deep connection with this area and the people who live here. We must reject the Tory narrative of austerity and decline. I believe we can do so much better with a Labour government that is committed to investing in the North and a local MP who truly understands the needs of this area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hugo Fearnley is committed to defending the NHS.
Hugo Fearnley aims to create green jobs.
Hugo Fearnley proposes to fix the broken housing system.
Hugo Fearnley intends to create opportunities for young people.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Nick Kemp on behalf of Hugo Fearnley both at 11 Barleycroft, Scarborough YO11 3AR.

images.caption: Image of candidate Hugo Fearnley with slogans indicating his key policies.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights local ties and experience of the candidate and emphasizes a rejection of the opposition's narrative.
